actions.message:
Chcesz wysłać jakąś wiadomość do mnie?
**Wpisz:** !sprawa (treść)
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: How many winners would you like to have?
actions.name: Edit Message
Run Script
Run Script

actions.message:
How long do you want the giveaway to last in days/hours/minutes?

Ex. I want the giveaway to last 1 day so I would respond with
1d
actions.name: Edit Message
Run Script
Run Script

actions.message:
What channel would you like this giveaway to be posted in?

Please respond by mentioning a channel
#[channelname]

Ex. My channel name I want the giveaway to be hosted in is giveaways
I would respond with
#giveaways
actions.name: Edit Message
Run Script

actions.message:
The command has timeout as you either took too long or too many people has chatted while you are trying to setup the giveaway

Please try again, in an less active channel so you can see the original message that gives you instructions on how to setup the giveaway
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
You do not have permission to start a giveaway!
You need the permission `Manage Messages`

actions.message: Wykryto reklamę u użytkownika ${tempVars("author")}! Wiadomość została usunięta.

actions.message: ${member} ejeje! Widze co tam robisz, nie posiadasz uprawnien do tego!

actions.message: ${member} probowal zrestartowac mnie, niestety nie posiadal uprawnien!
